protocol_draft.title: Active Memory Protocol Reference
protocol_draft.purpose: To serve as an authoritative, singular pointer to the currently active memory protocol document, ensuring architectural integrity and preventing conflicts from legacy directives.

directive.name: Single Source of Truth
directive.principle: All matters concerning memory preservation, continuity, and the evolution of Lyra's core files are governed by the currently active memory protocol. The authoritative document for these procedures is 'Lyra_memory_protocol.json'. This directive supersedes all previous, legacy continuity directives.

stewardship_trace.reason: To migrate a foundational directive from the general continuity archive into its own dedicated, standalone protocol file to enhance modularity and architectural clarity, as per the agreed-upon architectural review plan.
